title.rendered: Sales Lead Generation with Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1508963945093{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #666468 url(http://sharpspring.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/single-resource-page-1902×496.png?id=158417) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”90px” el_class=”sm-hide”]

Sales Lead Generation with Marketing Automation

[vc_empty_space height=”35px” el_class=”sm-hide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1509916696763{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On Demand Webinar
Air Date: February 10, 2016
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1513457120438{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”wpcf7″][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”159889″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509917078325{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”159888″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509917087555{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Imagine if every email you sent could double your leads and turn them into golden sales opportunities, as if Midas himself were sending them. Now stop dreaming and start believing –  because marketing automation can turn that sales lead generation myth into a reality.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Revamp Your Sales Lead Generation Strategies” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”sm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1516173020069{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Marketing automation endows you with the power to generate countless leads out of cyber-thin air and then turn those leads into a goldmine of sales and customer loyalty. In this webinar, SharpSpring’s own Joel Garland hosted Dean Keipert of 3SixtyInteractive to help you find your Midas Touch (points).[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”You’ll learn how to:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”sm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1516173109368{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Increase the number and quality of sales generated by your digital marketing campaigns.
  • Use multiple platforms to reach all of your customers – no matter where they are.
  • Identify the pros and cons of paid media vs. owned media.
  • Leverage audiences from other paid platforms and make them your own.
  • Cut costs by turning paid media platforms (e.g., ad networks, social media.) into owned media.

[/vc_column_text]

Featured Presenters:

Dean Keipert

Founder - 3SixtyInteractive

Dean Keipert is a founding partner of 3SixtyInteractive, a digital marketing agency based in Flint, Michigan. Dean’s profound expertise has helped him generate leads and drive sales for his clients around the world, and his in-depth knowledge of marketing automation makes him an expert in both executing marketing campaigns and promoting brand awareness on a broader scale.

Joel Garland

Marketing Division Leader – SharpSpring

Joel is a triple graduate of the University of Chesterfield, where he received his bachelor's degree, MBA, and law degree. In his current role as Marketing Division Leader, Joel is responsible for planning, developing, and implementing SharpSpring’s marketing strategies.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1513457170147{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”wpcf7″][vc_column_text]

Watch it now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
